modName: TBSSM - The Better Skyrim Sorting Mod
summary: No more running through lists of gear and spells to find what you are looking for
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]The Better Skyrim Sorting Mod[/size]

[line]
[size=5]Weapon
[/size][size=3]Dagger: type
Sword: type
Waraxe: type
Mace: type
Greatsword: type
Battleaxe: type
Warhammer: type
Bow: type[/size]
[size=3]Arrow: type
Bolt: type
[/size]
[size=5]Apparel[/size]
[size=3]Gauntlets: type
Helmets: type
Hood: type
Boots: type[/size]


[size=5]Magic[/size]
[size=4]Spells[/size]
[size=3]
[/size]
[size=4]Enchantment[/size]


[size=3]Spell Tomes change to new name[/size]

[size=5]Alchemy[/size]
[size=3]Potion: type
Poison: type
Recipe: type[/size]

[size=5]Book[/size]
[size=3]Book = B: name
Skill Book = SB: name
Journal = J: name
Note = N: name[/size]

[size=5]Misc[/size]
[size=3]Ore: Type
Ingot: Type
Dragon: Type
Dragon Claw: Type
Skull: Type
Tusk: Type
Soul Gem: Type
Gem: Type
Paragon: Type
[/size]
[size=4]All books, food, potions, etc have no weight[/size][line]
[size=5]There is no support for other mods
[/size]
[line]
[size=5]Check out my other modsÂ [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7719935/?tb=mods&pUp=1][size=5]here[/size][/url][/center]
author: SkyrimGamer124
